# spx-iframe



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                      | Type     | Default             |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------------------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Screen size of the site shown inside the iframe. | `string` | `'1440px'`          |
| `src`    | `src`     | Source for the iframe.                           | `string` | `'https://spx.dev'` |
